actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To provide for the study of certain prehistoric resources in the States of Colorado, Wyoming, and Utah.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior, in cooperation with the Secretary of Agriculture and the Chief of the U.S. Forest Service, to study and report to the House Committee on Natural Resources on locations and events associated with the historical theme of U.S. Western Region Prehistory, identifying locations and making recommendations for the preservation and interpretation of associated sites in Colorado, Wyoming, and Utah. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide for the study of certain prehistoric resources in the States of Colorado, Wyoming, and Utah.
